content.rendered:
GivePulse is a web-based tool that enables people and organizations to list, find, coordinate, and measure their impact in the community. Their mission is to “enable everyone in the world to participate and engage in lifting their community to new heights.”

Request a GivePulse Presentation

GivePulse Introductory Video

Watch the video below to learn how the GivePulse platform can help the University of La Verne community to list, find, organize, and measure the impact of service and volunteerism in the community.

GivePulse is the University of La Verne’s official community engagement platform. It is an online network of students, faculty, staff and community partners that connects the University members to service opportunities in the community. Everyone with a LaVerne email has access to GivePulse. You can access your account on the MyLaVerne Portal or download the FREE GivePulse App for iPhone and Android users and log in via LaVerne. 

Ready to use GivePulse? Use the quick guide and reference sheet to help get you started!

 

Give Pulse Tutorial Videos
